title: Logging onto League chat service.
body: So I log into League earlier today to play with a few of my friends, but when i logged in I couldn't see anyone that is online or access any of my chat service things. I restarted League about 3 times now and I still have this problem. I even called my friends to find out what is going on and some of them don't have this problem while the other half is also experiencing this problem. Is there any way I can fix this ASAP or must I wait for Riot Games to become aware of this problem and fix it?

replies.body: We've seen a few reports on this, and currently looking into cases where some players can't access the chat server!  In the meantime,  check out our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide for your specific issue.  The steps there will help tune up your connection and settings and hopefully re-establish connection to the chat server.  Hopefully, that will get you back in!
